sentences.en: Even their commitment to abolishing university tuition fees, a shibboleth in a party with a large student following, may be wavering.
sentences.cn: 他们许诺取消大学学费，这一政党的口令有大批学生拥护，可能会动摇。

sentences.en: They would say to him, Then say, Shibboleth.

words.tran_cn: 口令；（基督教《圣经》）考验用的词；特殊的习惯

trans.tran_cn: （党派、集团等的）准则，教条，用语，行话
